data.price: Ya ce: "Ya Ubangiji! Ka buɗa* mini, ƙirjĩna.
data.footnotes: * Ma'anar buɗa ƙirji, shine a sanya masa haƙuri.".

data.price: kuma ka sawwake mun Al'amari na
"Kuma Ka warware mini wani ƙulli daga harshẽna."

dua.name: Dua for Mental Fortitude
dua.significanceReason: Seeks divine assistance in expanding mental capabilities, communication skills, and emotional intelligence.
